dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach decision-making with a logical, step-by-step process, weighing all options before choosing.
Your FarTwin will make decisions based on their gut feeling or instinct, trusting their intuition to guide them.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflict resolution with a strong, assertive approach, standing up for themselves and others.
Your FarTwin will resolve conflicts in a tactful, considerate manner, seeking common ground and finding mutually beneficial solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams, charts, and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn by doing, preferring hands-on experiences and practical application over theoretical knowledge.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle problems with a methodical, step-by-step approach, analyzing data and evaluating options carefully.
Your FarTwin will solve problems with a more flexible, out-of-the-box thinking approach, considering unconventional solutions and possibilities.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view the world?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a more localized perspective, focusing on their immediate community and everyday concerns.
Your FarTwin will see the world as interconnected, with global issues and perspectives being of equal importance to local concerns.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social interactions, taking time to recharge and reflect on their thoughts and feelings.
Your FarTwin will thrive in high-energy, social situations, seeking out new people and experiences to engage with.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility and spontaneity, leaving room for unexpected opportunities and experiences.
Your FarTwin will approach time management with a more rigid plan, scheduling specific tasks and deadlines to stay on track.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely and openly express their emotions, seeking support and validation from others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions more private, hiding their true feelings behind a mask of politeness or neutrality.
